Tucson shifts into robot mode and presses his wings tightly against his bod=
y, while swiftly moving into the tunnel on silent and agile limbs. His shou=
lders do touch the tunnel and scrape them just a slight but realizing it qu=
ickly, he remembers his training and puts it to use.  He gets low to the gr=
ound and manages to just clear the hole in the tunnel.  It was lucky for hi=
m that the dragon head shifted to his chest plate upon transformation.  Yet=
 his keen ears remain in place on his helmet.  Like his sonar receptors, th=
ey are extremely sharp at picking up the slightest sounds.  He keeps them o=
n high alert at all times.  

" I hear movement.  And it's above us, coming=
 in our direction.  Shhh..  We have to stop moving for a moment, scramble o=
ur signatures and dim our optics.  What they can't detect will be to our ad=
vantage."

Tucson quickly does what Master Yokitron had taught him.

" it's=
 an old Ninjabot trick.  Master Yokitron taught it to all his students."

P=
erpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Oct 17, 2011, at 12:13 PM,=
 Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson =
gets up, sighs and follows them.
> >
> > " All right, I'll follow, but I st=
ill feel that I must deal with Rodimus
> > personally. I can NOT fail my pa=
rt of the mission. Many lives depend on
> > me, I can't let them down."
> 
=
> <NEW>
> 
> There was a nod from CONVOY, "I know your goal and I have hear=
d your
> reason why, and perhaps yet you will have your chance to make good=
 on
> it. But in order to achieve it you must still be free, not locked up
=
> in solitary confinement waiting on the torturous pleasure of
> Saberback.=
"
> 
> "Yeah, plus I am sure the mech will be chasin' us for sure anways."
=
> NIGHT VIPER said as he disappeared back into the hole.
> 
> The hole itse=
lf was just wide enough for BIG CONVOY and TUSCON to fit
> in, one by one, =
in robot mode, their shoulders perhaps a foot or less
> from scraping each =
side.
> 
> The hole looked to go into a tunnel that had been meticulously c=
arved
> out by someone, and then ladder steps cut into it to allow for
> mo=
vement. It was lit by small lamps near the top of the hole, the hole
> itse=
lf leading down into darkness.
> 
> Just before leaving BIG CONVOY took a d=
evice and used it to scan
> TUSCOn and then laid it in the recharging chamb=
er that TUSCON would
> have used and then placed one in his own. After a mo=
ment a hologram of
> each of them flickered into place.
> 
> "There that sh=
ould hold them for a while." CONVOY said as he motioned
> for TUSCON to get=
 in the hole. "It's time to move. It will be chamber
> check time in a few =
micro-klicks (Minutes)"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson shifts into robot mode and pres=
ses his wings tightly against his body, while swiftly moving into the tunne=
l on silent and agile limbs. His shoulders do touch the tunnel and scrape t=
hem just a slight but realizing it quickly, he remembers his training and p=
uts it to use.  He gets low to the ground and manages to just clear th=
e hole in the tunnel.  It was lucky for him that the dragon head shift=
ed to his chest plate upon transformation.  Yet his keen ears remain i=
n place on his helmet.  Like his sonar receptors, they are extremely s=
harp at picking up the slightest sounds.  He keeps them on high alert =
at all times.  </div><div><br></div><div>" I hear movement.  And =
it's above us, coming in our direction.  Shhh..  We have to stop =
moving for a moment, scramble our signatures and dim our optics.  What=
 they can't detect will be to our advantage."</div><div><br></div><div>Tucs=
on quickly does what Master Yokitron had taught him.</div><div><br></div><d=

 students."<br><br>Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. </div>=

=

ith Rodimus<br>

any lives depend on<br>

t;<br>

There was a nod from CONVOY, "I know your goal and I have heard=
 your<br>
reason why, and perhaps yet you will have your chance to make goo=
d on<br>
it. But in order to achieve it you must still be free, not locked =
up<br>
in solitary confinement waiting on the torturous pleasure of<br>
Sab=
erback."<br>
<br>
"Yeah, plus I am sure the mech will be chasin' us for sur=
e anways."<br>
NIGHT VIPER said as he disappeared back into the hole.<br>
<=
br>
The hole itself was just wide enough for BIG CONVOY and TUSCON to fit<b=
r>
in, one by one, in robot mode, their shoulders perhaps a foot or less<br=
>
from scraping each side.<br>
<br>
The hole looked to go into a tunnel tha=
t had been meticulously carved<br>
out by someone, and then ladder steps cu=
t into it to allow for<br>
movement. It was lit by small lamps near the top=
 of the hole, the hole<br>
itself leading down into darkness.<br>
<br>
Just=
 before leaving BIG CONVOY took a device and used it to scan<br>
TUSCOn and=
 then laid it in the recharging chamber that TUSCON would<br>
have used and=
 then placed one in his own. After a moment a hologram of<br>
each of them =
flickered into place.<br>
<br>
"There that should hold them for a while." C=
ONVOY said as he motioned<br>
for TUSCON to get in the hole. "It's time to =
move. It will be chamber<br>
check time in a few micro-klicks (Minutes)"<br=
